Smart Vacuum Cleaner with AI Navigation: Create a vacuum cleaner that uses artificial intelligence to navigate and clean a space more efficiently. The device could use sensors and machine learning algorithms to map the space and create a customized cleaning plan. This would result in a more thorough and efficient cleaning experience, with less time and effort required from the user. Confidence Score: 0.8

Vacuum Cleaner with Air Purification: Develop a vacuum cleaner that not only cleans floors and carpets but also purifies the air in the surrounding environment. The device could use a HEPA filter and UV light to remove allergens, dust, and other pollutants from the air, creating a healthier and more comfortable living space. Confidence Score: 0.9

Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Automatic Recharging: Create a robot vacuum cleaner that can navigate and clean a space on its own, but also has the ability to automatically recharge itself when its battery is low. This would eliminate the need for manual intervention and allow the device to continue cleaning for longer periods of time without interruption. Confidence Score: 0.8

Vacuum Cleaner with Advanced Suction Control: Develop a vacuum cleaner with advanced suction control technology that allows the user to adjust the suction power and direction in real-time. This would enable the user to clean more efficiently and effectively, with less effort required. Confidence Score: 0.9

Portable Vacuum Cleaner with Built-In Battery: Create a portable vacuum cleaner that has a built-in battery, allowing the user to clean without being plugged into a power outlet. This would make it easier to clean stairs, upholstery, and other hard-to-reach areas without the need for extension cords or power strips. Confidence Score: 0.8
